ModMetaData.name: Caravan My Way
ModMetaData.author: LucidBound
ModMetaData.description:
Enhance your caravanning experience with precise control over item distribution and timing!
Ever been frustrated when you really wanted your pawns to carry certain items but they get loaded into the pack animal instead? This mod gives you complete control over caravan formation:
Features: - Pick which pawn carries each item - See current and max carry weights (45/130) - Smart UI greys out pawns who are full or can't carry more - Works with vanilla stack splitting - Adds a "Wait to send caravan" option to let you manually control when the caravan departs - Safe and stable - no item duplication or loss
Perfect for players who want more control over their caravan organization!
